content: bobble all sts knitwise on the next row ws p all sts repeat last 2 row in total 3 times = 116 sts weave in all yarn tails and sew on 2 buttons by schneckenstrick pattern by schneckenstrick reproduce only with permission from schneckenstrick intended for personal use only reproduction distribution or sale of this pattern are prohibited 3 abbreviations co cast on k knit k2tog knit two stitches together m1l make one left lift loop between stitches from the front with left needle and knit into back of loop m1l purlwise - make one left lift loop between stitches from the front with left needle and purl into back of loop m1 r make one right lift loop between stitches from the back with left needle and knit into front of loop m1r purlwise - make one right lift loop between stitches from the back with left needle and purl into front of loo p p purl pm place marker rm remove marker sm slip marker rs right side ssk slip 2 sts knitwise one by one and then insert the left needle into front of both sts and knit the sts together st stitch sts stitches ws wrong side yo yarn over by schneckenstrick pattern by schneckenstrick reproduce only with permission from schneckenstrick intended for personal use only reproduction distribution or sale of this pattern are prohibited
